name: Fail Power
description:
Made for WOWIE! Game Jam 3.0.  

WASD and Space to move around

Press R to restart the Level.

Spikes return you to the last checkpoint you touched and change your power.  Powers cycle between fast speed, big jump, and gun.  

When you have the gun power, left-click to fire projectiles.

Sorry there's no UI, I'm still new to Unity.
